product_name: ExuvianceHydraPrep pH Skin Balancing Face Toner
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingExuviance HydraPrep pH Skin Balancing Face Toner is a skin balancing toner with PHA and botanical extracts.
details: DetailsBenefitsExuviance HydraPrep pH Balance Toner is formulated to hydrate and target the skin's natural pH balanceContains the Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) Glycolic Acid, with PHA and conditioning Botanicals to prepare skin for your optimized Exuviance intention skincare steps. Dermatologist and Allergy testedResearch ResultsPercentage of respondents noting improvement after two weeks twice daily use:100% hydrated and more supple skin97% skin feels more balanced97% skin looks brighter, more radiant and luminousKey IngredientsGlycolic Acid (AHA)Gluconolactone (PHA)Botanical ExtractsItem 2554743How To UseMoisten cotton ball or tissue. Gently smooth over a cleansed face in the morning and evening. Follow with an Exuviance serum or moisturizer. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.Precautions:IngredientsAqua/water/eau, Alcohol Denat., Butylene Glycol, Octoxynol-12, Glycolic Acid, Gluconolactone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Algae Extract, Cucumis Sativus (cucumber) Fruit Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (matricaria) Flower Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Disodium EDTA, Ammonium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Parfum (fragrance), Blue 1(CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Moisten cotton ball or tissue. Gently smooth over a cleansed face in the morning and evening. Follow with an Exuviance serum or moisturizer. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.Precautions:

reviews.headline: Excellent results on my combo skin!
reviews.comments: I have used this toner years ago and found it to work great during a hormonal skin issue.  So glad to have this product again!! I have tried several other new exfoliating toners but stinging and drying occurred with oiliness after time.  This never seems to happen with this one!

reviews.headline: this is amazing! wow
reviews.comments: I have tried numerous glycolic toners before but this one is by far the best. it is hydrating and exfoliating. it balances my skin out!

reviews.headline: Unnecessary dyes in product
reviews.comments: This toner contains harmful and unnecessary blue and yellow dyes in it. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.headline: Love the product.
reviews.comments: I've been using another brand for several years and I did not  think I would find something comparable. This is actually much better and more reasonably priced.

reviews.headline: Stripped my skin
reviews.comments: The associate who sold this to me said it was close to what I normally use. Within four days it had stripped my skin of all my natural oils and made me break out worse than I've EVER had. Returned quickly. Had to see had a dermatologist fix the mess.

reviews.headline: Can't do without it
reviews.comments: This toner just completes my skin routine. It feels like it just sinks into my skin prepping it for my serum and Citrafirm oil. I recently tried the Indie Lee toner and it broke me out, Clinique dries me out and others make me super oily.

reviews.headline: Gentle!
reviews.comments: This stuff is gentle and leaves my skin so smooth. Now I can use this 2-3 days in a row but will need a one day break but it doesn't like burn it or anything. This is still the most gentle toner I've been able to find that doesn't strip it or dry it out.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: While it does a decent job at hydrating, there is overwhelming fragrance and if you have sensitive skin it will burn/irritate the skin.

reviews.headline: gorgeous toner
reviews.comments: This toner is not irritating to my skin at all. It feels really gentle, yet I can tell that it has been keeping my skin clear, smooth and with a healthy glow. After 2 weeks of consistent use, my skin complexion looks brighter and the texture is smoother.

reviews.headline: Pretty good
reviews.comments: This toner is light Weight and absorbs quickly. Love this stuff!

reviews.headline: makes my skin brighter
reviews.comments: This toner restores the pH balance. It makes my skin brighter and more radiant. This toner is part of my AM skincare.

reviews.headline: Smells fine
reviews.comments: I like this toner and make sure to use it after I wash my face daily.

reviews.headline: The perfect toner finally
reviews.comments: 34 years old, still break out from time to time but I also get dried out for most acne toners. This is the best toner I have ever used!!! It's a 10 out of 10

reviews.headline: I would buy this product over and over again!
reviews.comments: What can I say, this product is awesome,a permanent buyer of this!!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and again!
reviews.comments: I was a little hesitant at first about purchasing this because the thought of getting older is so daunting, but I knew I had to start somewhere, and I'm glad I did!  This is a game changer!  This really makes my skin looks so refreshed and new!

reviews.headline: A quality toner
reviews.comments: This toner is effective. I like the slight tingle from the acids, and my skin feels prepped, toned and clean after using it. My only complaint is while I do love the scent, I don't like artificial perfume in my skincare.

reviews.headline: Works Great!!
reviews.comments: this toner took my skin to another level! as a matter of fact this is my third skin product from exuviance and i am very pleased.

reviews.headline: Love this product!!!!
reviews.comments: Over the years I've had a hard time finding a good toner for my skin. With help from the people who work at Ulta referring this brand I'm completely amazed on how great my skin is using it!!!

reviews.headline: Good purchase, recommended by cashier
reviews.comments: I went to Ulta in search of a new Toner because I was using one that contained witch hazel which isn't good for the skin. I told a cashier I was looking for a quality toner than I could use on my skin. At the time I thought I had dry skin but she informed me that my skin looked like combination skin. After being skeptical, I bought the product. I have to say it smells very good. Almost like cucumbers. It does work very well for clearing your pores. Especially the ones on my nose. The only reason I give 4 stars is because I am unable to use this everyday. It breaks me out, so I only use it at night, every other night. If you have the financial state to buy a morning and night toner I would certainly buy this and use it for night usage! overall, I was very happy with my purchase and will continue buying for my nightly routine!

reviews.headline: GREAT GENTLE TONER
reviews.comments: If you're looking for a simple toner to add to your collection this one is GREAT. I hesitate to say moisturizing because that's not what timers are meant for. I will say this does wonders for balancing out my skin and my face is definitely not oily throughout the day. It doesn't make my face feel tight but cleansed and refreshed!!

properties.name: Best Uses

values.label: Tone after double cleansing, remove make up

display_values: Tone after double cleansing, remove make up

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using this product for about 6 years now( and 2 repackaging changes later). I walked into an Ulta Beauty in Florida and asked the Rep for something to keep my skin balanced and not stripped but clean and comfortable, balancing out my combination skin. She brought me the Exurviance Moisture Balancing toner,  I was skeptical but it worked for my skin and helped with my pores, they were clean and my skin felt refreshed. This toner doesn't have an overwhelming fragrance either.  I have kept this in my arsenal because my skin loves it. I have been through a lot of trials with toners but this one remains my main squeeze, my go to, my old faithful.
faceoff_positive.headline: I have been but most definitely

faceoff_negative.comments: The associate who sold this to me said it was close to what I normally use. Within four days it had stripped my skin of all my natural oils and made me break out worse than I've EVER had. Returned quickly. Had to see had a dermatologist fix the mess.
